trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud seems satisfied that he and Watt are of one mind.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_TODO_00<tab>Wait inside the gate to the Ala Mhigan Quarter.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Raubahn.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Lyse.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_WATT_000_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_WISCAR_000_005<tab>Grandad and his friends are already hard at work─the rest of us can do no less, eh?

TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>It seems Wiscar has the Saltery's security well in hand. I, meanwhile, have discussed the next steps with Master Watt, and completed my inspection of the site.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_ALPHINAUD_000_011<tab>With a little work, the vacant buildings here could be made into very presentable dwellings.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_FLAMEHERALD_000_012<tab>Message from General Aldynn!
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_FLAMEHERALD_000_013<tab>Apologies for the interruption, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, but the General would speak with you at your earliest convenience!

TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_ALPHINAUD_000_014<tab>Do not feel obliged to wait around on my account. I will remain here to hammer out the finer details with Watt, and act as an intermediary with our business partners in Ul'dah. You should go.

TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_FLAMEHERALD_000_015<tab>General Aldynn asked that you wait for him by the main gate in the Ala Mhigan Quarter. My apologies again, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>! Fare you well!

TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_WATT_000_020<tab>That Alphinaud's a bright lad, isn't he? I told him what we'd need to repair the place and he tallied up the total cost on the spot─and it weren't a small number, either!
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_WISCAR_000_025<tab>I'll ask Commander Hext to assign a squad to patrol the Saltery's harvesting and fishing spots. And I'll be sure to tell them what you told me!
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>Pray leave the administrative tasks to me. General Aldynn will be waiting.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_ARENVALD_000_040<tab>I was just on my way to the Saltery─it's lucky I saw you!
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_PIPIN_000_045<tab>Arenvald seems flustered. Something is amiss...
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_RAUBAHN_000_050<tab>That took longer than I intended, but at least you know where I stand.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_RAUBAHN_000_051<tab>Now that's settled... Arenvald─what news?
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_ARENVALD_000_052<tab>We may have a problem, sir.

TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_ARENVALD_000_053<tab>A group of Ananta has arrived at the main gates. And I don't mean the Vira. These are <var 1A 02 /var>Qalyana<var 1A 01 /var>─the ones that summoned the primal.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_ARENVALD_000_054<tab>They're insisting they be allowed to attend the council. Lyse is trying to reason with them, but she may need help...
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_PIPIN_000_055<tab>Hmm... An invitation <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> extended to all of the native beast tribes...but we assumed the Qalyana would refuse it out of hand.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_RAUBAHN_000_056<tab>We had best go and see for ourselves. Pipin, take command of our forces and be ready for battle.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_RAUBAHN_000_057<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─you've dealt with these Qalyana before. I'd have you at my side.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_LYSE_000_060<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Raubahn! Gods, it's good to see you...
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_QALYANAPATRIARCH_000_061<tab>Ah! The ssslayer has come.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_QALYANAPATRIARCH_000_062<tab>We have not forgotten how you sssinned againssst the Lady of Blisss...but we did not come here to shed blood.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_QALYANAPATRIARCH_000_063<tab>You claim to ssseek harmony with all who call Gyr Abania home. If thisss is truly your wish, you will welcome usss as envoys of the Ananta!
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_LYSE_000_064<tab>It <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> our wish, and you <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> welcome. But we cannot condone the summoning of primals.

TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_LYSE_000_065<tab>If you want to enter the palace, I must ask that you first surrender any crystal jewelry. You have my word that it will all be returned to you when the meeting is over.

TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_QALYANAPATRIARCH_000_066<tab>...We will do as you asssk─but you will not have our weapons. We are not ssso foolish as to place ourssselves <var 1A 02 /var>entirely<var 1A 01 /var> at the mercy of our tormentors...
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_RESISTANCEWARRIOR_000_067<tab>I reckon that's the closest we're going to get to a compromise. And we <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> have people standing guard...
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_RAUBAHN_000_068<tab>Aye, let them keep their swords.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_QALYANAPATRIARCH_000_069<tab>Then we have an agreement. Lead the way to your meeting chamber.
TEXT_STMBDB110_02971_RAUBAHN_000_070<tab>Why do I have the feeling we've welcomed a viper into our midst...?
